sentence.Network_en: The value of the complement of the secant is called the cosecant.
sentence.Network_cn: 正割函数的倒数，称为余割函数。

sentence.Network_en: A secant is defined as line passing through two points of the curve.
sentence.Network_cn: 割线的定义是一条通过曲线上两点的直线.

sentence.Network_en: The pulse envelope we obtained is a hy - perbolic secant function of time.
sentence.Network_cn: 所得脉冲包络为时间的双曲正割函数.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.; from French sécante, based on Latin secare 'to cut'

means.word_mean: 1. a straight line that intersects a curve at two or more points
2. ratio of the hypotenuse to the adjacent side of a right-angled triangle
